reference_a:
@article{gainey2023,
  title = {Decentering from emotions in daily life: {{Dynamic}} associations with affect, symptoms, and well-being},
  shorttitle = {Decentering from emotions in daily life},
  author = {Naragon-Gainey, Kristin and DeMarree, Kenneth G. and Kyron, Michael J. and McMahon, Tierney P. and Park, Juhyun and Biehler, Kaitlyn M.},
  date = {2023-09-01},
  journaltitle = {Clinical Psychological Science},
  volume = {11},
  number = {5},
  pages = {841--862},
  publisher = {SAGE Publications Inc},
  issn = {2167-7026},
  doi = {10.1177/21677026221147262}
}
topics: awareness, mindfulness, emotion, cognitive fusion, well-being
sampling_scheme: 6x/day pseudo-random intervals with minimum interval between prompts
participants: adults, oversampled for people in treatment or seeking treatment
additional_comments: 11 participants participated in baseline but not ESM

features.name: active
features.wording: Recently, I have felt active
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: interested
features.wording: Recently, I have felt interested
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: excited
features.wording: Recently, I have felt excited
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: strong
features.wording: Recently, I have felt strong
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: irritable
features.wording: Recently, I have felt irritable
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: upset
features.wording: Recently, I have felt upset
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: afraid_anxious
features.wording: Recently, I have felt afraid or anxoius
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: sad
features.wording: Recently, I have felt sad
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: meaning
features.wording: How much meaning have you felt in your life recently?
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: vitality
features.wording: To what extent have you felt alive and vital recently?
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: observe_thoughts_feelings
features.wording:
Recently, I have been able to observe my thoughts and feelings without being drawn
in.
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: struggled_thoughts_feelings
features.wording: Recently, I have struggled with my thoughts and feelings.
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: detached_thoughts_feelings
features.wording: Recently, I have experienced my thoughts and feelings as separate from myself.
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: caught_up_thoughts
features.wording: Recently, I have been caught up in my thoughts.
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: mindful
features.wording: Recently, I have been focused on what was happening in the present moment.
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: meta_aware
features.wording: Recently, I have noticed my feelings and thoughts.
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: reappraisal
features.wording: Recently, I  changed the way I thought about what caused my feelings.
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: distract
features.wording:
Recently, I did something or thought about something to distract myself from my
feelings.
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: brooding
features.wording:
Recently, I kept thinking about the causes or consequences of my negative feelings,
how bad I felt.
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: savoring
features.wording: Recently, I kept thinking about how happy and strong I felt.
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: resist_temptation
features.wording: Recently, how much willpower have you had to resist temptations?
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: getting_done
features.wording: Recently, how much willpower have you had to get things done?
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: mental_exhaust
features.wording: How mentally exhausted have you been recently?
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: symptom_experience
features.wording: To what extent have you experienced [insert personal major concern that was predefined by the participant] recently?
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: symptom_interfere
features.wording: To what extent has [insert personal major concern that was predefined by the participant] interfered with your ability to accomplish things recently?
features.labels:
1 = very slightly or not at all
2 = a little
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: depressed
features.wording: To what extent does each statement describe how you have felt recently? I felt depressed
features.labels:
1 = not at all
2 = a little bit
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: anhedonia
features.wording: To what extent does each statement describe how you have felt recently? I had little interest in my usual hobbies and activities
features.labels:
1 = not at all
2 = a little bit
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: inadequate
features.wording: To what extent does each statement describe how you have felt recently? I felt inadequate
features.labels:
1 = not at all
2 = a little bit
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely

features.name: discouraged
features.wording: To what extent does each statement describe how you have felt recently? I felt discouraged about things
features.labels:
1 = not at all
2 = a little bit
3 = moderately
4 = quite a bit
5 = extremely
